resources.string:
This is a simple Music Player program that demonstrate the Ability of Android Binding to bind a list of object. 

 Press "Scan for files" and it will pull the names of all your music from the SD card, and store in the app local DB. Each Assigned a default "rating" of 3. 

 Each Entry in the list is binded to the Cursor, coming directly from the SQLiteDatabase. In the example here, whenever the user change the Rating, a "Save" Command is issued and save the current record back to the database. 

 For more information, visit: http://code.google.com/p/android-binding/wiki/BindingListOfObjects
